alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 8:39PM CDT until April 16 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. Two Rivers River near Hallock affecting Kittson County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Two Rivers River near Hallock. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to late Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 802.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD STAGE. Hallock Dam spillway at Gilbert Park closed to the public. Culverts with flappers are checked. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 801.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 803.1 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 802.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
